summary: Most requested changes appear implemented: app rename (header alt/title + HTML title), odds formatting utilities and History formatting, and a new in-app Android APK help tab with WebView-wrapper instructions referencing websitetoapk.com. One specific acceptance criterion for the New Entry odds input blank state (showing â€œ-/1â€) cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: When the numerator is empty, the UI reads as "-/1" (e.g., placeholder '-' in the numerator field with the visible '/1' suffix).
missing_requirements.reason: A formatter for the placeholder ("-/1") was added, but the EntryFlow UI portion that would show the placeholder/suffix next to the input is truncated; there is no explicit evidence in the visible diff that the numerator input uses placeholder '-' while showing a fixed '/1' suffix in the New Entry rows.
